title: Vivendi to Launch Takeover Bid for Hachette Owner Lagardère
sub_head: Deal would resolve lengthy tussle over book publisher’s owner and bolster billionaire Vincent Bolloré’s influence over French media
body:
PARIS— Vivendi SE said it plans to launch a takeover bid for Lagardère SA, a deal that would resolve a yearslong saga over control of the Hachette books owner.
The French conglomerate, which is already Lagardère’s biggest shareholder, said Thursday it would seek to take full control of the company after finalizing the purchase of Amber Capital’s 17.5% holding. Vivendi said that deal, agreed in September, would be completed in the coming days, paving the way for it to file a tender offer for the rest of Lagardère.
